Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ramon Enrique Berliza Yorro
Reviews.Content: this is a powerful camera, GE designed wonderful item. it comes with all the accesories but you have to buy a memery. It works great, color and estructure are nice.

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the price, this does exactly what I needed it to.  The settings are rather difficult to get used to... I'm still not sure what some of them do as they don't seem to be useful for the intended purpose.  For instance, anything I take with the "action" settings all turn out blurry.  I suppose there's no way to hold my hands that steady.  But... I've used this to take pictures at rodeos, and on the normal setting even the fastest barrel racer or quickest bull turned out perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Dharma
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my daughter. Item as described. It is always assumed that you need an SD card when purchasing a camera but would be helpful to have listed what items are included in package.

Reviews.Title: GE T123
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey T Elder
Reviews.Content: ok camera. package is hard to open and does not come with memory card. had i known there was no memory card included i would have ordered a card, or bought a different camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.7" LCD display with an incredible 12.2 megapixel sensor
Shooting modes such as Scene, Sunset, Fireworks, Night Landscape, Panorama, Portrait and more
ProductInfo.Name: GE T123 12MP Digital Camera
